Text: as andy kaufman would say, thank you veddy much

Why thank ee sai, as the gunslinger would say!  STF I was hoping you could help me out;  I am looking for books with 2 obscure marvel characters; the Torpedo and 3D Man from the 70's.  I think they were in the Marvel Premier book

Marvel Premiere 35, 1st app. 3-D Man.
Marvel Premiere 39, 1st app. Brock Jones as The Torpedo (third version).

Your valiant work is much appreciated and will be seeded while I have a seedbox (1.75 TiB so far and counting...)
I appreciate the seeds!  I got a lot more obscure stuff to post, just gotta find the time and get more bandwidth!  lol
